author: Gavin Blair
title: Japan's Abe declares state of emergency amid coronavirus outbreak
description: Declaration is in response to surging number of infections, although people cannot legally be forced to stay home.
content:
Tokyo, Japan - Prime Minister Shinzo Abe has declared a one-month state of emergency in response to the rapidly increasing number of coronavirus infections in big cities, though people cannot legally be forced to stay home or businesses be forced to close.
